page.title: 18A Day in the Life of Emily
page.content: I am 11 years of age and I live in the{North_West part of Chard.}I live {in }a small row of cottages called {Hillside}which is along{Combe Street. I usually get up at 7.30_8.00am. I have my breakfast at 8.15_8.30,and go to{school}at 8.45 each weekday. School starts at 9.00 and carries on until 3.30pm.I am a 4th year Junior at{Manor Court Primary School which has 560 pupils from 4+ to 11+ years of age.In September 1985 I will be going up to{Holyrood Comprehensive {School,Chard . After school I walk home with my 9 year old sister.I usually play in the {garden}and watch{Children's TV.}I have my{tea}at about 6.00pm .I usually watch the later programmes,then I go to{bed}at 8.30_9.00pm.
